"A.P.241/10/21": "Somehow, for a moment there you looked like Gettemhart... Please forget what I said."
"1. Do you want to meet Gettemhart?"
"Yeah. I wish that could come true..."
"Thank you for worrying about me... I'm alright, really."
"Somehow, if I given the chance to meet Gettemhart again..."
"I was pretending to be my sister... I wanted to tell him that I disguised myself as Melphonsina. I think that's the reason I want to meet him again."
"The next time we meet, I... I think I can tell him as Melrondia. "
"Maybe that's really hopeless. If I met him the way I am right now, I would probably just freeze and wouldn't be able to say anything."
"I can only say that because I know that I can't meet him anymore. That's how I can say that."
"Dreams are only dreams that we yearn for. I can only live my life in hopes of achieving that dream."
"The last words that he said to me. I can still remember them clearly... I'm a little lonely, but I'm alright."
"Ah, I'm sorry. I don't know how we got to this topic... Somehow, I just got a bit nostalgic. "
"Tsk. That was really troublesome. Do you intend to meddle more?"
